body:
For versions supported in Spack, ICU4C defaults to the C++11 Standard. Provide a variant to default to this, plus options for C++14 and 17 if dependees require for ABI compatibility.

A `default` value for the variant is not supplied, as ICU4c's configure script appears to always fall back to C++11 if `CXXFLAGS` does not contain a `-std` flag.
title: icu4c: Add cxxstd variant
